section.name: Built-in directives
section.p: Directives are probably the most useful part in anycode generation. Below, you'll find a set of functions and macros that you can use directly in you template code. You can use them directly to in your templates or in your own macros. We will try to offer more and more directives for various languages in the future releases. See the Roadmap for details.
